name: Super Sheep - PSX
description:
You as super sheep need to protect the village from the waves of skeletons and dragons. For this you need to eat lots of grass (left-button (4) ) to gain attacks. Use this dash attacks with down-button(3) to dash through your enemies...

For some emulators != pcsx-redux I had problems getting the game to start at all. Not sure why. Use the bundled packages.
